summary.span: 表示支持在 中水平滚动选项卡的面板。

span.span: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of tabs in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供按行的水平滚动中控制。The provides horizontal scrolling by line for controls in a . 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
